entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Molly Weasley is worried about her family and their safety during the war with Voldemort. She is concerned that they may not all survive and who will take care of Ron and Ginny if she and Arthur are killed.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin tries to calm down Mrs. Weasley by handing her a handkerchief and telling her that the Order is better prepared this time around.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry tries to smile and tell Mrs. Weasley not to be stupid when she is worried about her family.
